implicit: Are they big enough? → Client logos prove scale
Is their work good? → Featured work shows quality
Are they professional? → Site design matches portfolio quality

Minimal text, maximal imagery
Clean, sophisticated (matches 'mature playful' brand)
Fast loading (image optimization critical)

Consistent image aspect ratios for clean grid

Play on Set → Get in the Box → Go Home. The three-step philosophy.
